Html:
Hi all,

does anyone know if it is possilbe to connect two vertex with mouse event? 

Maybe with Drag&Drop oder with a menuitem in contextmenu?

Is there an event? 

Thank you for your help!

Okay I realized it by using Drag&Drop :)

But now I have the problem of moving Verticles. 

If I drag a vertex it comes with my mouse pointer. 

How can I set a vertex to fix, so that it cannot move?

Maybe I receive an answer if I change my question?

I can drag&drop my verticles arround but my problem is, the vertex thinks he is still selected.

So the effect: when I drag&drop a vertex somewhere and my mousepointer goes over the dragged vertex I can still move it without any MouseDown. 

This ist not nice. Please can anyone help?
Okay by changing the dll I get my result...
i'm trying to do the same, can you post some sample please?
